com.xrtb.nativeads.assets

Class Asset

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xrtb.nativeads.assets.Asset

  • public class Asset
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that defines the assets used in a native ad bid request and used in the campaign definitions
    Author:
    Ben M. Faul

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Entity data
      A data entity, will be non null if this ia a data asset

      static int IMAGE

      Entity img
      A img entity, will be non null of this is an IMAGE asset
      Entity link
      A link entity means there is a call to action associated with the other entity in this part
      static int LINK 
      Entity title
      The value of the title
      static int TITLE 
      Entity video
      A video entity, will be non null if this is a video entity
      static int VIDEO 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Asset()
      Empty constuctor used by Jackson when the campaign is created.

      • getEntity

        public Entity getEntity()
        Return the entity that belongs to this asset.
        Returns:
        Entity. The entity of this asset

      • getEntityName

        public java.lang.String getEntityName()
        Return the name of the asset entity.
        Returns:
        String. The name of the entity as the JSON element.

      • getDataKey

        public java.lang.String getDataKey()
        If this is a data asset, return 'type'. Otherwise returns null.
        Returns:
        String. Returns 'type' if this is a data asset.

      • getDataType

        public int getDataType()
        Return the data 'type' if a data seet, else returns -1.
        Returns:
        int. The data type defined by the RTB ad native spec.

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Return the type of asset.
        Returns:
        int. Returns the asset type as integer flag.

      • toStringBuilder

        public java.lang.StringBuilder toStringBuilder(int index)
        Used to form the bid response for a native ad. Returns the String (builder) representation of this asset, using the index number provided (which matches the index used in the bid request).
        Parameters:
        index -
        Returns:
